name: do your errands | the game
description:
it's 11 pm, and you get a text from your mom with some errands to do. Luckily for you, there's a store nearby.

but once you get there, curiosity gets the better of you.

Objective: Do your errands.

Dye:tg is an ending-based game, explore the area and discover things you may or may not have found on your last run.

Collect trophies and badges for many of the things you find.

but whatever you do, don't mess with that White Lantern.

music by @spiraledants
